heroSection.title: ZincObserve
heroSection.subtitle: Streamline Your Operations with Worry-Free Observability - Logs,Metrics, Traces and More in One Platform

items.heading: ZincObserve Features
items.title: ZincObserve is Built for Full - Text Search
items.desc: ZincObserve is a search engine that can be used for text data, logs, metrics, events, and more. It allows you to do a full-text search, among other things, including sending server logs to ZincObserve, pushing your application data, providing a full-text search, or building a search bar in your application.

content.title: ZincObserve Features
content.subtitle: Discover the Game-Changing Features of ZincObserve:

items.title: Log Search and General Observability Solution
items.desc: Don't let your logs go unnoticed. ZincObserve offers a search-around logs data feature that allows you to easily identify and fix any issues in your system.

items.title: Storage-Efficient and Cost-Effective Logging
items.desc: ZincObserve leverages a unique approach to data storage and indexing that eschews reliance on indexing altogether. Instead, it stores un-indexed data in a compressed format, utilizing local disk or object storage in parquet columnar format.

items.title: Accelerate 10X fast performance
items.desc: ZincObserve is a cutting-edge observability platform designed for the cloud that allows you to monitor your logs, metrics, and traces with ease.

items.title: Comprehensive alerting mechanisms
items.desc: With scheduled and real-time alerts, you can stay on top of critical problems as they happen.This means that you can quickly address any issues and keep your systems running smoothly.

items.title: Advanced Data Analysis
items.desc: With ZincObserve, dashboards can display data from logs, metrics, and traces,providing a complete picture of system behavior.
